an5.83:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacarinam appiyo ca hoti amanapo ca agaru ca abhavaniyo ca.
an5.83:1.3: Kuhako ca hoti, lapako ca, nemittiko ca, nippesiko ca, labhena ca labham nijigisita—
an5.83:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacarinam appiyo ca hoti amanapo ca agaru ca abhavaniyo ca.
an5.83:2.1: Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacarinam piyo ca hoti manapo ca garu ca bhavaniyo ca.
an5.83:2.3: Na ca kuhako hoti, na ca lapako, na ca nemittiko, na ca nippesiko, na ca labhena labham nijigisita—
an5.83:2.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato thero bhikkhu sabrahmacarinam piyo ca hoti manapo ca garu ca bhavaniyo ca”ti.
